crinkle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if you crinkle part of your face, or if it crinkles, you move it so that small lines appear on it
crinkle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: His mouth crinkled into a smile.
He smiled boyishly, crinkling his eyes.
Her face crinkled up in disgust.
crinkle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to become covered with small folds, or make something do this
crinkle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The heat was beginning to make the cellophane crinkle.
crinkle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a thin fold, especially in your skin or on cloth, paper etc
crinkle.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The first crinkles of age were beginning to appear round her eyes.
